english: pillow; to rest the head on; cushion; bolster

etymology.interpretation: Wood supplies the meaning, indicating a wooden object used to support the head. 冘 provides the sound, reflecting an older pronunciation that later developed into zhěn.

examples.chinese: 我喜欢高一点的枕头(我喜歡高一點的枕頭)。
examples.pinyin: Wǒ xǐhuan gāo yìdiǎn de zhěntou.
examples.english: I like a slightly higher pillow.

examples.chinese: 他枕着手臂小睡(他枕著手臂小睡)。
examples.english: He napped with his head resting on his arm.

examples.chinese: 旅行时可以用衣服当枕头(旅行時可以用衣服當枕頭)。
examples.pinyin: Lǚxíng shí kěyǐ yòng yīfu dāng zhěntou.
examples.english: While traveling, you can use clothes as a pillow.
